A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So watched the last jedi.... Hmmmm my thoughts are I liked it but it had some flaws some major and some minor...

Can't really do a lot hole write up with this cause it's to spoiler heavily.. But I will say there is some stuff that was built up in episode VII the force awakens that was just sort off just ignored and kinda like meh.. It was a journey with no pay off. Some other stuff in the story that really really didn't need to be there.... And something that happens that was both sad and joyful...
Enough with the flaws I had 
For the most part I really did like the last jedi.. I had tears in some scenes it was emotional and great... but at the end of the day the bad out way the good unfortunately
